comment: He is an amazing professor to take online! A week usually consists of making one study guide and doing a discussion post. He grades both non-harshly and you'll usually get 100's on both assignments. He gives quick youtube videos most weeks of him lecturing, they are informative and great. Definitely take him!

(TOOK FOR COMM 2020) Discussions that prepare you for the literature review, quizzes, and papers throughout the semester for the literature review, and the final grade is the literature review. He gives great feedback on assignments and is an easy grader. He made COMM 2020 easier than I thought, and it wasn't hard compared to what others said.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment:
He is a very good professor. 

- Discussion post 
- Selfmade Study guide ( you include anything you want in your study guide based off that weeks' information) 
- 3 papers that is a big part of your grade, they were not hard. Plus he lets you edit and revise them if you don't like you're grade. 
- Responds quickly to emails, and also open to help.

comment: Discussions are due every week. Sometimes, there's a quiz but no lockdown browser. Assignments are sections of your paper and the final paper is the "final exam". He responds to emails quickly and gave great feedback on discussions and assignments.

Professor Zuercher is a decent professor and better than some of the professors who teach the Research Methods course. However, his lectures are outdated and his late work policies are absolute. He will not work with you regardless of the reason for your late work. He also makes you buy a textbook that you will barely use.

rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Accessible outside class

comment: Very straightforward professor who clearly lays out the class and grades quickly and fairly. Weekly discussion and study guide (lowest grades dropped), three short papers, midterm and final. Much of this is a rehash of prior MENT/COM classes, so very easy. FYI - when taking him for more than one class, papers will have same due dates. TAKE HIM!!!

Three papers, midterm, and final. Weekly discussions and study guides required. I'm a strong writer, so I didn't find the papers too difficult, and the same with the discussions. The essay questions on the exam were a bit tough. Lectures are short and to the point. Great feedback and very timely with grading. One of the best!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Zuercher's class is really easy. He's also really nice and is a pretty lenient grader. If you do the work you'll pass. He also drops some of your lower grades at the end of the semester.

Dr. Zuercher was great this semester! This class consisted of a discussion post or paper and a written study guide each week. I enjoy the study guide assignment more than I thought, its tedious but it forces me to learn and read the textbook. He responds to emails quickly and is so sweet. I recommend him 10/10!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: This class was great and Dr. Zuercher was awesome! He did a great job at responding quickly to emails where I had questions. You have a discussion post every week, a study guide due each week and he drops 4 of your lowest grades on those, 3 papers, 2 test and a reflection. A lot of work but if you organize it right you will do great!

comment: I enjoyed the class. He assigned concept maps which were different from what I'm used to doing. They really helped tie all of the info together. There are only 4 so they're important. The discussion questions are also very important. Make sure to do those. All in all, very helpful and knowledgeable. Learned a lot. Enjoyable class.

comment: If you have the option to take this class online I would highly suggest this professor. This is one of the few classes I can say with confidence that I have learned a lot of useful information. He gives you a week to finish your work and it is more than enough time. You have 4 concept maps, 2 quizzes, and weekly discussions. Great prof and class.

comment: Dr. Zuercher was such an amazing professor! We usually had one discussion due each each along with only 2 or 3 quizzes during the semester, also three separate concept maps that were super easy if you took notes. I would take him again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Amazing lectures

comment: Great professor, everything you need to do is told explicitly and gives you all the resources you need! Discussion post every week, a few quizzes, and a final project make up your grade and he gives great feedback on everything so you know exactly what he wants and expects. Really easy to contact as well! Would 100% take him again

Professor Zuercher is so nice! I had him for an online class and its mostly a discussion post every week with a quiz. Theres two major tests (i recommend getting the textbook) so I would definitely study, but otherwise hes a great professor and will always answer any questions you have. Take his class, you wont regret it!
the easiest class you will ever take. there was a quiz every week and a discussion post every week. 5 tests. the lowest quiz and discussion are dropped. simple instructions.

Professor Zuercher's online class was probably the easiest class I've ever taken just because he is so straight forward with what he wants. Beware there are like 13 quizzes that are timed for 5 minutes (they aren't bad) and 2 tests in which are written out in paragraph form (EASY A). There is 1 final paper but he gives great feedback. Take him!
